vehicles.description: A white sedan is stopped at a traffic signal ahead on the right side of the road, facing the same direction as the ego car.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle may affect the driving behavior of the ego car since it is directly in the pathway ahead and could indicate either a traffic regulation or an obstruction that the ego car needs to be aware of.

traffic lights.description: There are traffic lights mounted on a portable structure in the middle of the road with an illuminated green arrow pointing to the left.
traffic lights.explanation: The green arrow indicates that the ego car is allowed to proceed, but must make a left turn as the right path seems to be blocked or closed for through traffic.

barriers.description: Yellow and black striped barriers are placed in the middle of the road below the temporary traffic lights, diverting traffic.
barriers.explanation: These barriers suggest a road closure or construction ahead on the right side of the road, requiring vehicles to turn left.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the observed traffic scene, there is a white sedan stopped at a traffic signal ahead on the right side of the road, facing the same direction as the ego car. This presence of the vehicle might influence the driving behavior of the ego car, as it indicates a potential traffic regulation or an obstruction ahead that needs to be acknowledged. Additionally, the scene includes traffic lights mounted on a portable structure in the middle of the road, with a green arrow illuminated, pointing to the left. This green arrow signals that the ego car is permitted to continue, but exclusively through making a left turn, implying the right path is likely obstructed or closed for through traffic. Moreover, yellow and black striped barriers are positioned in the middle of the road beneath the temporary traffic lights, steering the traffic to the left. These barriers imply there might be a road closure or ongoing construction on the right side of the road, necessitating a left turn for vehicles. Vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic cones, and other objects do not appear in this particular traffic scene, indicating their absence or irrelevance to the driving conditions at this moment.

1.description and explanation: This object is a traffic light, which is an electronic signaling device positioned at road intersections, pedestrian crossings, and other locations to control flows of traffic. The traffic light shown has a green signal illuminated, indicating that vehicles traveling in the direction of the ego car are permitted to proceed. The ego car, observing this green signal, should continue moving forward, following any additional road rules relevant to the intersection, such as yield rules or posted speed limits.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should reduce speed and prepare to make a left turn at the intersection, due to the green arrow indication by the traffic lights and the placement of barriers directing traffic to turn left. It is also advised to monitor any changes in the traffic lights and be aware of other vehicles that may be following the same detour. Maintain a safe distance from the car ahead, monitor the speed and behavior of traffic, and be prepared to respond to the traffic signals. As the car is approaching a green light, the ego car should proceed with caution due to the barrier ahead that may involve a change in traffic patterns. Stay alert for any roadworks signs or additional traffic guidance that may affect the flow of traffic.
